Within a decade, tens of thousands of biotech-savy individuals could single-handidly cause a [new pandemic](https://www.gcsp.ch/sites/default/files/2024-12/gcsp-geneva-paper-29-22.pdf), due to massive drops in the cost of DNA sequencing and synthesis, hardware, and unprecedented access to knowledge through AI.
